roleset.name: bend out of shape
roleset.note: WARP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'warp' based on sentences in brown.VN updated by Julia, 10/2010. Member of Vncls bend-45.2. (from warp.01-v)

example.name: participle
example.text: She turned and walked stiffly into the parlor to [the dainty-legged escritoire]-1 , warped *trace*-1 and cracked now from fifty years in an atmosphere of sea spray .
example.arg: from fifty years in an atmosphere of sea spray
